document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2017-05
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO REPEAL SECTION 19.10.120 SECOND RESIDENTIAL UNITS AND ADOPT A NEW CHAPTER 19.39 ACCESSORY DWELLING UNITS CONSISTENT WITH CURRENT STATE LAW
